content: I want to book holiday packages
SELECT Name, Price, Type, NumberOfDays, NumberOfNights FROM HolidayPackages
Give me list of all attractions
SELECT Name, Type, Location, PriceRange FROM Attractions
Now I want to book flight
Sure, where would you like to go?
Could you please provide your travel dates?
Where would you like to go?
What information would you need about Paris?
I want to book flight to paris from London
SELECT Name, DepartureCity, ArrivalCity, DepartureDate, DepartureTime, ArrivalDate, ArrivalTime, Price FROM Flights WHERE DepartureCity = 'London' AND ArrivalCity = 'Paris'
SELECT FlightName, DepartureDate, DepartureTime, ArrivalDate, ArrivalTime, Price, AvailableSeats FROM Flights
